name: 作業系統
description: 本課程之目的為大學部學生瞭解作業系統的基本概念，課程內容包括作業系統的歷史演進、作業系統的組成、以及系統資源配置管理的相關課題
goals: 了解作業系統架構與原理
了解記憶體與檔案系統
分析不同作業系統架構差異與優缺點
透過分組專題了解作業系統架構
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週】

Week 1: Chapter 1: Introduction  
Week 2: Chapter 2: Operating System Structures  
Week 3: Chapter 3: Processes  
Week 4: Chapter 4: Threads  
Week 5: Chapter 5: CPU Scheduling  
Week 6: Chapter 5: CPU Scheduling (cont.)  
Week 7: Chapter 6: Process Synchronization  
Week 8: Chapter 6: Process Synchronization (cont.)  
Week 9: midterm examination  
Week 10: Chapter 7: Deadlocks  
Week 11: Chapter 8: Main Memory  
Week 12: Chapter 9: Virtual Memory  
Week 13: Chapter 9: Virtual Memory  
Week 14: Chapter 10: File-System Interface  
Week 15: Chapter 11: File-System Implementation  
Week 16: Final examination  
Week 17:  Flexible course, Final project  
Week 18:  Flexible course, Final project
